donatellomartie, i guess i do, though you can find 'em here:
http://thepiratebay.org/search/PSP%20Patapon/0/7/0

D.Coiote, speaking of patching procedure, i use the next one. (you need a psp homebrew called ISO tool to perform it and a PSP, obviously)
1)launch ISO tool, select you game's ISO in the list, press X. In the pop-up menu select 'Decrypt EBOOT'. It'll ask you two questions, with a big deal of safety you can answer 'Yes' to both of 'em. Then wait untill EBOOT is decrypted and replaced.

2)after all pop-ups disappear, select you game's ISO again, press X again, and in the pop-up menu select 'Patch Prometheus'.
What patch should we pick? For most games you can use one of the latest patches like 'ME631', '06BETA1' or at least 'prometheus4'. Though, in some cases you should use game-specific patches, like 'KHHBS' or 'DJMAX3JP'.
